Portal is a simple game, deceptively simple at times build around a genius set of mechanics to create physic based puzzles that are satisfying to solve as the game gives you everything you need and eases you in at the begining. Placing one portal with a left click and the exit portal with a right click is a simple concept but the way it is utilised here keeps you on your toes throughout the campaign and had me anticipating every challenge. The game's writing is it's second biggest strength glados has become legendary for good reason as the wit present always put a smile on my face. The portals are the games bread and butter and it never deviates from them. There are no gimmicks present for better or worse which leads to it's consistent but short run time. The game took about four hours on my first run but after finishing it I just wanted more. Unfortunately the games advanced labs are just harder versions of the same puzzles present in the campaign and while the challenges on each room may appeal to some it didn't appeal to me. That being said those fours hours were a joy as the gratification gained from playing portals in the right place and clearing the puzzles is incredibly satisfying. Portal is undoubtedly a great game that anyone with even remote interest in physic based puzzles should play. It's a brilliant foundation but there's room to build and it seems like valve thought the same thing

Еще одна классическая игра от Valve. То чувство, когда я тебя сводит олдскулы от осознания, что это великолепная, атмосферная игра!
В этой игре необходимо решать квесты, используя для перемещения устройство, создающее порталы. 
Игра выполнена в милом н. ф стиле! В игре присутствуют: милые турели, исскуственный интелект, мемы (cake is a lie) и много чего другого! Я не знаю, пусть она вам не понравится, но она обязательна к ознакомлению каждому геймеру-олдскульщику! 10 тортиков из 10!

Ben bulmaca oyunları seven ve hepsini %100 bitirmeye çalışan birisiyim. Portalı da %100 bitirmeyi başardım. Oyun o kadar garip ki mi diyeyim %100 yapmaya çalışırken en sinirlendiğim ve en eğlendiğim bulmaca oyunuydu. :/ Sırada Portal 2 var ve eminim daha zorlu olacak. Ben Portal ve Portal 2'yi Bundle aldım ve 3.40 TL gibi bir şey tuttu. İki oyunu da +15 saat oynadığım için verilebilecek en güzel 3 liraydı. Normal fiyatlarını da sonuna kadar hakediyorlar. Portal™ — новая игра от Valve для одного игрока. Portal, действие которого происходит в загадочных лабораториях компании Aperture, был назван одной из самых новаторских игр современности и предлагает вниманию игрока множество часов непохожей ни на что головоломки.

I've had this game for a while and have played through it multiple times. I've also seeked out all Portal Content I could find when I was really into this game. Needless to say I absolutely adore the Portal games and they are definitely some of my favorite games ever, I love the story and the characters and the atmosphere. I recommend everyone to play these games if they haven't, and even if you don't like them as much as me, you may still get an enjoyable experience outta it!
